newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: CRICKET-NATAL 86-4 AT LUNCH AGAINST FREE STATE.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-NATAL 86-4 AT LUNCH AGAINST FREE STATE.

text.p: Natal were 86 for four in their first innings at lunch on the opening day of their four-day Supersport Series cricket match against Free State at Kingsmead on Friday.
Natal - Doug Watson, Mark Bruyns, Errol Stewart, Jonty Rhodes, Dale Benkenstein (captain), Neil Johnson, Derek Crookes, Keith Forde, Pat Symcox, Keith Storey, Tertius Bosch.
Free State - Deon Jordaan, Gerhardus Liebenberg (captain), Boeta Dippenaar, Kosie Venter, Chris Craven, Nicky Boje, Franklyn Stephenson, Bradley Player, Philip Radley, Nico Pretorius, Sarel Cilliers.
